title: does this make anyone else's blood boil?

replies.body: I don't even get why saying "shut up and fucking play dude, holy" should be reportable in the first place. Yes, there are curse words in there. But given League of Legends' target audience and T rating, curse words should not be an issue. It's another way to say "pls be quiet and play".

It is an insult and if i would have a jurisdiction insurance for paying my lawyer i would sue everyone saying it. The audience does not matter, it is insulting to "people"... yes i know it is tough to understand there are actually people behind the screen playing the champ.

It might be another way of saying it.. still it is rude. If i would say: "just gtfo and hope you get cancer" might be another way of saying "Please der Sir, we both might feel more relief when our communication ceases so i can concentrate on the game"...
it is still not polite and i would never say that or wish it to someone.

"just gtfo and hope you get cancer" is wishing a horrible disease on someone. It's not the same as telling someone to stop typing arguments and just play the game.

"shut up and just play the fucking game" is telling someone who's probably busy typing bullshit to get his shit together and actually do something useful in the game. It's not an insult. It's practically the same as my friends telling me to "get my shit together and fucking study" when I complain about a bad grade. It is actually respectful that they are treating me like an adult and telling me to take responsibility rather than saying "oh its just the teachers fault for not being a good teacher" etc. There is 1 person I can change, and it's me. Most of the time the teacher is actually fine and I'm just being lazy, however, even if the teacher is bad, if I can't drop the class, I have to still try my best to study and do well.

When I tell someone who is arguing with someone else to "shut up and play the game" it's because I believe that they are capable of being a better person and not letting the troll drag them down to their level.
Why do you not mute the kind that gets to you? Seems counter-productive.

its complicated, because i always think "well they aren't too bad. maybe they will stfu and we can get this going"

i give the benefit of the doubt way too much with it.
but omfg. it tilts me.

and even if i do mute, its the people who spam "?" on you every 3 seconds. no matter what you are doing, because they want you to go 1v5 steal the objective from the people they fed.
